dc.title: NICEATM-ICCVAM - Home
dc.description: NICEATM coordinates the efforts of ICCVAM to organize the evaluation and approval of alternative toxicological methods that reduce, refine, or replace the use of animals while introducing reductions in cost and/or time throughout multiple US Federal Government agencies.
